idea:
Playydate| Onlive Live Extra-curricular classes for Kids'


Playydate is an online LIVE Classes platform for kids’ extra-curricular classes, primarily focused on the 1 -14 yrs age group. We serve an underpenetrated segment, consisting of a huge unorganized market of educators, & activity centers on one hand and a keen and willing parent community looking to discover and book a variety of learning experiences for the holistic development of their children. In India, less than 5% of the kids in this age group have access to these programs. Historically, these programs were conducted offline and restricted to a few top metro cities like Mumbai, Bangalore, New Delhi etc which have high quality educators. However, with the online live classes model, we believe there is a massive opportunity to democratize learning and make high quality programs accessible to kids across the length and breadth of the country at affordable prices.
name: PLAYYDATE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
